6 #Components Components

Components are collections of classes used to construct a user interface element.

6.1.1 #Components.Headings.c-heading-giga c-heading-giga

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Example

Six javelins thrown by the quick savages whizzed forty paces beyond the mark

Markup 
<h2 class="c-heading-giga">Six javelins thrown by the quick savages whizzed forty paces beyond the mark</h2>
